data.name: title
data.description: Sets the title of the accordion item.

data.name: size
data.description: Sets the size of the accordion item.

data.name: animationSpeed
data.description: Specifies the speed of the opening and closing animation.

data.name: rounded
data.description: Determines the border radius of the accordion item.

data.name: containerClasses
data.description: Custom classes for the accordion's main container.

data.name: openContainerClasses
data.description: Custom classes for the active (expanded) state of the accordion's container.

data.name: titleClasses
data.description: Custom classes for the title of the accordion item.

data.name: openTitleClasses
data.description: Custom classes for the title when the accordion item is active (expanded).

data.name: contentClasses
data.description: Custom classes for the content section of the accordion.

data.name: id
data.description: Unique identifier for the accordion item.

data.name: flush
data.description: A minimalist variant of the Accordion component, designed for a sleek and simple appearance

data.name: open
data.description: Custom classes for the title when the accordion item is active (expanded).

data.name: title
data.description: Custom classes for the title when the accordion item is active (expanded).
